institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 14 (Business Plan Submission and Approval)
contents: Article 14 (Submission and approval of business plan) ① Supporting companies selected in accordance with Article 11 must submit a business plan to the head of the affiliated organization. However, the type of learning network activity is submitted by the learning network council for each region (hereinafter referred to as *council)., ② The head of the affiliated organization reviews the business plan submitted by the applicant company for the feasibility of the plan and the appropriateness of project cost calculation, etc. Approval must be notified to the applicant company.
